name: Ezzedine Jlidi
description: I am a full-stack developer and a recent graduate in Licence Génie Logiciel et Systèmes d'Information from the Faculty of Science. Driven by passion, I taught myself web development through both theory and hands-on practice. I’m confident in the quality of my work — feel free to explore my projects below.
dyariDescription: Dyari is a platform where users share sweet and savory (tout ce qui est sucré et salé) posts, allowing others to browse and place orders directly.
babarDescription: Babar is a tournament-style game where users pick between two options repeatedly until one final winner is chosen.
stageDescription: Stage is a platform where companies post internship opportunities and users can apply directly to them.
ktebnaDescription: Ktebna is a platform where people can share their books to either sell or exchange them with others.
